text: Click here for Commissioned Officer Post Details Indian Air Force Recruitment 2017 – Store Keeper, Cook & Other Posts: Indian Air Force has invited applications for the recruitment of Store Keeper, Cook, Safaiwala vacancies by direct recruitment in IAF at HQ Eastern Air Command Units. Eligible candidates may apply in prescribed application format within 30 days from the date of advt. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below… Indian Air Force Vacancy Details: Total No. of Posts: 09 Name of the Posts: 1. Store Keeper: 01 Post 2. Cook: 03 Posts 3. Safaiwala: 05 Posts Age Limit: Candidates age limit should be between 18 to 25 years as on last date prescribed for receipt of application. Age relaxation is applicable as per rules.   Candidates should have 12th pass or equivalent for Post 1, Matriculate or equivalent from a recognised Board/ University for Post 2, 3. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on written test/ physical test/ practical test.   may send their duly typed application in prescribed format with passport size photograph, photo copies of educational qualification certificates, date of birth certificates, caste certificate, experience certificates, self addressed envelope of bearing Rs. 5/- postage stamp to Officer- in-Charge, Civil Admin Section of the concerned Air Force Station within 30 days from the date of advt. Important Dates: Date of Advt: 31-12-2016 to 06-01-2017 Last Date for Receipt of Application: within 30 days from the date of advt.   reservation, pay scale, experience   below… Click here for Recruitment Advt & Application Form - Indian Air Force Recruitment 2017 – MTS & Safaiwala Posts: Indian Air Force has issued a notification for the recruitment of MTS & Safaiwala vacancies of Group ‘C’ Civilian Posts in CSDO by direct recruitment. Eligible candidates can apply in the prescribed application format within 30 days from the date of advt. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below… Indian Air Force Vacancy Details: Total No.of Posts: 03 1. MTS: 01 Post 2. Safaiwala: 02 Posts Age Limit: Candidates age should be between 18-25 years as on the closing date of receipt of application. For age relaxation details refer the notification.   Candidates should have Matriculation pass or equivalent qualification from a recognized university/ board. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on written examination.   send their application in the prescribed format along with self attested photocopies of all relevant certificates as mentioned in the notification & envelope should be superscribed with “The post and category for which applied” should reach to The Air Officer Commanding, CSDO, Air Force, Subroto park, New Delhi- 110 010 through ordinary post within 30 days from the date of advt. Important Dates: Date of Advertisement: 14-01-2017 to 20-01-2017. Last Date for Submission of Application: within 30 days from the date of advt.   pay band, desirable qualification, vacancy details   below…. Click here for Recruitment Advt & Application Form - Indian Air Force Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for Commissioned Officer Posts: Indian Air Force has invited applications for the recruitment of Commissioned Officer vacancies in Metorology Branch by conducting course commencing in January 2018 for grant of Permanent Commission (PC)/ Short Service Commission (SSC) in Ground Duty (Non-technical) Branch. Eligible men and women may apply online from 21-01-2017 to 17-02-2017. Other details like age, qualification, selection process, how to apply are given below… Indian Air Force Vacany Details: Name of the Post: Commissioned Officer Age Limit: Candidates age should be 20 to 26 years as on 01-01-2018 (Born between 02 Jan 92 to 01 Jan 98 both dates inclusive).     Post Graduate Degree in any Science stream/ Mathematics/ Statistics/ Geography/ Computer Applications/ Environmental Science/ Applied Physics/ Oceanography/ Meteorology/ Agricultural Meteorology/ Ecology & Environment/ Geo-physics/ Environmental Biology with minimum of 50% marks. Selection Process: S election will be based on Intelligence Test, screening test, Psychological, Group Tests and Interview.   may apply online through the website “www.indianairforce.nic.in” from 21-01-2017 to 17-02-2017. Important Dates: Start Date to Apply Online 21-01-2017 Last Date to Apply Online 17-02-2017 Date of Modification of Details 18 & 19-02-2017 First week of January 2018   salary   below…
